pullRequest.title: [NETBEANS-3413] Implicit inheritance of PHPDoc descriptions
pullRequest.bodyText:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/NETBEANS-3413
Uses description of inherited element when no PHPDoc is present.

nodes.bodyText: Should use Collections.emptyList() instead of new ArrayList<>()

nodes.bodyText: OT: And for parentDescription as well, could you please add it? Thanks.
OT: Also, the whole method should be annotated by @CheckForNull (IIRC) since it can return null if I understand it correctly. Thanks.
OT: Again, missing annotations for null values.
